subject: Re: keep us in your thoughts
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Misty,

I will read up on what was posted in getting the review of the 
situation and i will call and help with a session if i can.  I would 
love to get at least something for them to go on, wish me luck.

-Steve H.



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
>
> I am so sorry Tammi I know you and your family must be devastated. 
I send much love and light your way to guide you!!!
> 
> And a simple warning. This is quite a large group of genuine 
helpful people however there are a few out there (you know who you 
are I wont name names) who think its ok to charge people money to do 
a session for them in thier time of grief so please ignore anyone who 
would even think about trying to solicit you or gain a profit off it. 
> 
> I personally frown upon that tactic.
> 
> There are also many caring individuals in the community who may 
step forward to try and be of assistance. At no charge. Just hoping 
anything could help your family. 
> 
> HUGGGZZZ
> 
> Misty
> 
> 
> 
> --- On Wed, 9/24/08, mamahaugs <mamahaugs@...> wrote:
> 
> > From: mamahaugs <mamahaugs@...>
> > Subject: [EVP-ITC] keep us in your thoughts
> > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> > Date: Wednesday, September 24, 2008, 6:58 AM
> > Hi I am newer to this sight I enjoy reading all your
> > messages. My step 
> > daughter Nina Ornelis disappered in the Rock River
> > yesterday afternoon 
> > around 2:30 search starts again at daybreak. and if anyone
> > can check 
> > the otherside if you happen to find out where we should be
> > looking 
> > please call Tammi at 641 782-5914. My husband name is Rich.
> > Thanks 
> > Tammi
>
